I don't do piercings. I'm circumcised though. Before anyone asks, it's not of Jewish origin, alright? Circumcision in Philippines started in the Pre-Spanish Filipino tribes as rite of passage, a tradition still done today. 

I might do tattoos, if and when I kill my first enemy. It's also a tribal Filipino practice.
